message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% of the total amount right off the bat. It's a good deal considering the inflation!

Alice, since you face 5% inflation per round and I don't, accepting this fair offer now is better than prolonging negotiations. I'm offering you $4500, which is much better than getting a depreciated amount later.
Bob, it seems you're underestimating how inflation affects things. This is my counter-offer. I'm willing to be generous, but I need you to meet me halfway.
